description.long: Upon impact, the Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize most targets. If you have also trained Cross Punch, this power's damage is increased by 15% and will fatigue the target, draining some endurance and lowering recovery slightly. The synergy with Kick and Cross Punch stacks.  Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
